title: Login Issue
description:
User unable to log into account with correct credentials.
They reported multiple failed attempts despite correct password.

title: Payment Failure
description:
Payment not going through during checkout.
The customer tried with different cards but still failed.

title: App Crash
description:
Mobile app crashes immediately after the new update.
Issue only appears on iOS devices running version 17.0.

title: Refund Request
description:
Customer requesting refund for duplicate payment.
They claim the payment was charged twice in error.

title: Slow Website
description:
Website performance drops significantly during peak hours.
Users experience delays loading product pages.

title: Account Locked
description:
Account locked after multiple failed login attempts.
User cannot reset password due to missing reset link.

title: Shipping Delay
description:
Order not shipped even after 7 business days.
Customer is concerned about missing a gift deadline.

title: Feature Request
description:
Customer requesting dark mode in web application.
They suggested an option in settings to toggle it.

title: Email Not Received
description:
Verification email not arriving in the user's inbox.
Customer already checked spam and promotions folders.

title: UI Bug
description:
Profile picture not updating in the dashboard.
The issue persists across browsers and devices.
